When Meng Fie disobeys his father for the seventh time in a row, his luck takes a turn for the worse. The naive young swordsman is framed for a murder he did not commit, and his famous Jade Sword is implicated as the murder weapon.
 Desperate to clear his name, Meng enlists the help of a female swordsman with whom he confronts notorious Shaolin rebel Ti Shu Chan Sing and the secretive Green Dragon society.
